title: Exquisite Neelam Haaram - Sapphire and Diamond Cascade Necklace
materials: Base metal with high-quality gold plating
adorned with pear-cut simulated Neelam (Sapphire) gemstones and sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a Hyderabadi-style polish for a lasting shine and rich appearance.
features: This elegant Haaram showcases a cascading design with pear-shaped Neelam stones encircled by dazzling CZ diamonds. The symmetrical arrangement and central pendant enhance its traditional appeal with a contemporary touch. The necklace uses a secure clasp ensuring a comfortable fit.
colors: Deep blue (Neelam) of the gemstones contrasts beautifully with the golden base
creating a rich and striking color palette.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings
or festive celebrations. Its versatile design makes it suitable for both traditional Telugu functions like Muhurtham or Sangeeth and modern social gatherings.
description: This Neelam Haaram offers a stunning combination of traditional aesthetics and modern elegance. The high-quality simulated gemstones provide the look of luxury without the premium price. The durable gold plating ensures longevity, making it a treasured piece for years to come. Its exquisite craftsmanship reflects the rich jewelry heritage of Hyderabad.
